subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Gypsum-sand mortar and gypsum-sand plaster must consist of eitherâ€”

ol.li: not more than 3 parts by volume of sand to 1 part by volume of gypsum; or
if lime putty is added, not more than 2.5 parts by volume of sand to 1 part by volume of gypsum and not more than 5% of lime putty by volume of the mixed ingredients.
